name: Goat Cheese Salmon
author: Ani
summary: This recipe for salmon is so simple and delicious, it's crazy! This is great for any weeknight dinner, yet will impress your guests, as well. Serve with oven roasted herbed potatoes or jasmine rice. Enjoy!
ingredients: ¼ cup prepared Dijon mustard mayonnaise blend
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a large baking dish
Arrange the salmon fillets in the baking dish
Make small incisions in each fillet, and stuff with equal amounts of the herbed goat cheese
Spread equal amounts prepared Dijon mustard mayonnaise blend over each fillet
Bake salmon 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until easily flaked with a fork
